column1: Hi, my name is BuddyBot. I will ask questions to get to know you better. What would you like me to call you?
Nice to meet you {Username}. How was your day?
column3: That is wonderful! It’s always nice when things go smoothly. I’m really happy for you!
column5: That is wonderful! It’s always nice when things go smoothly. I’m really happy for you!
column7: An okay day is still progress. I hope that you found something good in it.
column9: I’m very sorry to hear that. Off days happen, but I’m here for you if you need anything.

column1: Do you have any activities that you do to enjoy your free time {Username}?

column1: {Username}, when planning a trip, are you more spontaneous or do you prefer planning?
column3: That sounds exciting! Embracing spontaneity can make trips so much more adventurous and full of surprises."
column5: That’s totally okay! Sometimes it’s hard to choose one approach, and flexibility can be a great strength when travelling.
column6: Maybe a little bit of both.
column7: A mix of both sounds perfect! Having some plans while staying open to spontaneity gives you the best of both worlds.
column9: That makes sense! Careful planning can bring peace of mind and help everything go smoothly when travelling.

column1: {Username}, when you are stressed, how do you relax?
